A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Cheesey lightsaber duels\, poor special effects\, weak story\, this film was a failure in so many ways! Luke's story is awful. Projection duel? What a weenie way to kill off the franchise's most iconic character? Rey is all of a sudden afraid of Kylo Ren? She beat the snot out of him in the previous flick! Story wandered aimlessly into plots that went nowhere and/or were just dull. I.e. Luke training Rey\, The pointless trip looking for the codebreaker\, Kylo trying to nuke Luke. This is by far the worst film in the whole franchise!
